articles.title: Annealing with Sulfate lasers
articles.description: This article discusses working with Sulfate lasers.
capabilities: Infinitely smooth transitions between polarization regions.
Intense cleaning of appendages caught in beam.
requirements: Maintainance of temperature and concentration of sulfate tank.
Annealing material of uniform thickness on micrometer scale.
Homogenous, phase-locked beam characterized by 0-0 beam mode.
Desired appendages kept out of beam.

articles.title: Slow-Roll Annealing with Tiny Monkeys
articles.description: How to utilize slow-roll annealing with the aid of tiny monkeys.
capabilities: Consistent grain size and directional growth over a range from millimeter scale to several orders of magnitude smaller.
requirements: Sufficient patience and lab time for slow rolling.
Homogenous material of purity > .9999 and uniform thickness to within one monkey.
The fortitude to withstand the wailing of entire monkey populations without being tempted to mercy.
